source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot looking down into the murky, greenish water of a swimming pool. The bottom is lined with a grid of small, square tiles, with a darker, wet-looking patch visible in the center. The scene is largely static with very subtle water movement.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot looking down into the murky, greenish water of a swimming pool. The bottom is lined with a grid of small, square tiles, with a darker, wet-looking patch visible in the center. The scene is largely static with very subtle water movement.

generated_critique: The video shows a gentle breeze causing ripples on the surface of the pool, and a small fish briefly swims across the center before disappearing from view.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: A gentle breeze creates ripples on the surface of the murky, greenish water of a swimming pool. The bottom is lined with a grid of small, square tiles, and a small fish briefly swims across the center before disappearing from view.
